scripts.build:dev: [ -f .env.production.local ] && mv .env.production.local .env.production.local.backup || true && cp .env.development.local .env.production.local && react-scripts build && [ -f .env.production.local.backup ] && mv .env.production.local.backup .env.production.local || rm -f .env.production.local
scripts.build:staging: [ -f .env.production.local ] && mv .env.production.local .env.production.local.backup || true && cp .env.staging.local .env.production.local && react-scripts build && [ -f .env.production.local.backup ] && mv .env.production.local.backup .env.production.local || rm -f .env.production.local
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && firebase use development && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && firebase use staging && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && firebase use production && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:prod:manual: echo 'Are you sure you want to deploy to PRODUCTION? This should only be done after staging approval.' && read -p 'Type YES to continue: ' confirm && [ "$confirm" = "YES" ] && npm run deploy:prod
scripts.workflow:dev: echo 'Starting development workflow...' && npm run start:dev
scripts.workflow:staging: echo 'Building for staging...' && npm run build:staging && echo 'Deploy to staging with: npm run deploy:staging'
scripts.workflow:prod: echo 'Building for production...' && npm run build:prod && echo 'Deploy to production with: npm run deploy:prod:manual'
